SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConsoleColour
 
FilePathManager
Manages file paths for tweets and lexicons.
LexiconParser
Parses lexicon files to extract word sentiment scores.
MainMenu
Main menu for the Sentiment Analysis application.
Menu
Abstract base class for menus in the Sentiment Analysis application.
Options
Class responsible for managing extra options in the application.
Output
Interface for outputting results in the Sentiment Analysis application.
OutputDirectory
Manages the output directory for storing results.
OutputFolder
Handles the output of sentiment analysis results to a file.
Parser
Interface for parsing files.
PathManager
Interface for managing paths.
ProcessingTweets
Processes tweets and calculates their sentiment scores.
Runner
Entry point for the Sentiment Analysis application.
SentimentAnalysisManager
Manages the process of sentiment analysis including parsing lexicons, processing tweets, and outputting results.
TweetProcessor
Abstract class for processing tweets.
